00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "KviQString.h"
00029 #include "KviTimeUtils.h"
00030 
00031 
00032 class KVIRC_API KviIrcConnectionStatistics
00033 {
00034         friend class KviConsoleWindow; // to be removed
00035         friend class KviIrcConnection;
00036 public:
00037         KviIrcConnectionStatistics();
00038         ~KviIrcConnectionStatistics();
00039 protected:
00040         kvi_time_t m_tConnectionStart; // (valid only when Connected or LoggingIn)
00041         kvi_time_t m_tLastMessage;     // last message received from server
00042 public:
00043         kvi_time_t connectionStartTime(){ return m_tConnectionStart; };
00044         kvi_time_t lastMessageTime(){ return m_tLastMessage; };
00045 protected:
00046         void setLastMessageTime(kvi_time_t t){ m_tLastMessage = t; };
00047         void setConnectionStartTime(kvi_time_t t){ m_tConnectionStart = t; };
00048 };
00049
